name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
schedule:
Week　　Class Task / Activities 　　(Assignment)

1　　Introduction　　　　　　　　　　
2　　Arguments 
3　　Logic 
4　　Thesis statements　　　　(1-page free writing due)
5　　Topic sentences
6　　Counter Arguments 
7　　Finalizing your topic　　　　(Mid-term draft due)
8　　Group presentation
9　　(Mid-term Essay due)
10　　Thesis Development 
11　　Style: Clarity 
12　　Style: Clarity　　　　　　(Final Essay draft No.1 due)
13　　Style: Clarity
14　　Style: Clarity　　　　　　(Final Essay draft No.2 due)
15　　Presentation
16　　Presentation
17　　Presentation
18　　(Final Essay due)

Course requirements: Students are required to 　　
(1)　　write one mid-term essay, with 6 to 8 pages
(2)　　write one research paper, with 10 to 12 pages, using MLA or APA documentation     
(3) 　　give presentations on a chosen topic agreed with the instructor 
(4) 　　evaluate and edit their peers’ writings.
scorePolicy:
Grading Policy:　　
(1) Attendance: 10% 
(2) Presentations: 20%
(3) Mid-term essay: 30% (10% + 20%)
(2) Final essay:  40% (10% + 10% + 20%)
materials: Williams, Joseph. Style: Lessons in Clarity and Grace. (10th Ed). London: Longman, 2010.
